alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 25 at 2:55PM EST until January 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 20 to 29 below zero. * WHERE...Much of northern Vermont and northern New York. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will drop well below zero tonight into early Wednesday morning with northwest winds of 5 to 10 mph. The coldest wind chills will occur from 4 AM to 8 AM Wednesday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
